These Credits are permanently yours and: These Credits are permanently yours and can be unlocked at any time. LBRY takes privacy and choice seriously. Just a few questions before you enter the land of content freedom.
Can this app send information about your: Can this app send information about your usage to inform publishers and improve the software?
Yes, including with third-party analytic: Yes, including with third-party analytics platforms
Sending information to third parties (e.g. Google Analytics or Mixpanel) allows us to use detailed analytical reports to improve all aspects of LBRY.
Yes, but only with Odysee, Inc.
Sharing information with Odysee, Inc. al: Sharing information with Odysee, Inc. allows us to report to publishers how their content is doing, as well as track basic usage and performance. This is the minimum required to earn rewards from Odysee, Inc.
No information will be sent directly to: No information will be sent directly to Odysee, Inc. or third-parties about your usage. Note that as peer-to-peer software, your IP address and potentially other system information can be sent to other users, though this information is not stored permanently.
While we respect the desire for maximall: While we respect the desire for maximally private usage, please note that choosing this option hurts the ability for creators to understand how their content is performing.
FINAL WARNING: This action is permanent: FINAL WARNING: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
This action is permanent and cannot be u: This action is permanent and cannot be undone
Email %help_link% or join our %chat_link: Email %help_link% or join our %chat_link% if you encounter any trouble verifying.
try again in a few seconds.

Blocked channels will be invisible to yo: Blocked channels will be invisible to you in the app. They will not be able to comment on your content, nor reply to your comments left on other channels' content.

People who view this link will be redire: People who view this link will be redirected to your livestream. Make sure to use this for sharing so your title and thumbnail are displayed properly.
You need to upload your livestream detai: You need to upload your livestream details before you can go live. Please note: Replays must be published manually after your stream via the Update button on the livestream.
Create a Livestream by first submitting: Create a Livestream by first submitting your livestream details and waiting for approval confirmation. This can be done well in advance and will take a few minutes.
The livestream will not be visible on yo: The livestream will not be visible on your channel page until you are live, but you can share the URL in advance.
Once the your livestream is confirmed, c: Once the your livestream is confirmed, configure your streaming software (OBS, Restream, etc) and input the server URL along with the stream key in it.
To ensure the best streaming experience: To ensure the best streaming experience with OBS, open settings -> output
Select advanced mode from the dropdown a: Select advanced mode from the dropdown at the top.
Ensure the following settings are select: Ensure the following settings are selected under the streaming tab:
If using other streaming software, make: If using other streaming software, make sure the bitrate is below 4500 kbps or the stream will not work.
After your stream:\nClick the Update but:
After your stream:
Click the Update button on the content page. This will allow you to select a replay or upload your own edited MP4. Replays are limited to 4 hours and may take a few minutes to show (use the Check For Replays button).
Click Save, then confirm, and you are do: Click Save, then confirm, and you are done!
Note: If you don't plan on publishing yo: Note: If you don't plan on publishing your replay, you'll want to delete your livestream and then start with a fresh one next time.
You have no lists yet. Better start hoar: You have no lists yet. Better start hoarding!
You're invited to try out our new livest: You're invited to try out our new livestreaming service while in beta!
Send crypto to the address provided and: Send crypto to the address provided and you will be sent an equivalent amount of Credits. You can pay with BCH, LTC, ETH, USDC or DAI after starting the swap.
Credits sent. You should see it in your: Credits sent. You should see it in your wallet.

The system is currently down. Come back: The system is currently down. Come back later.

Use the copy button to ensure the EXACT: Use the copy button to ensure the EXACT amount is sent!

Received amount did not match order code: Received amount did not match order code %chargeCode%. Contact hello@lbry.com to resolve the payment.
Users are currently limited to 4 complet: Users are currently limited to 4 completed swaps per month or 5 pending swaps.

We will review and respond shortly.
Comments and livestream chat containing: Comments and livestream chat containing these words will be blocked.
Minimum time gap in seconds between comm: Minimum time gap in seconds between comments (affects livestream chat as well).
Enabling a minimum amount to comment wil: Enabling a minimum amount to comment will force all comments, including livestreams, to have tips associated with them. This can help prevent spam.
Enabling a minimum amount to hyperchat w: Enabling a minimum amount to hyperchat will force all TIPPED comments to have this value in order to be shown. This still allows regular comments to be posted.
This channel requires a minimum tip for: This channel requires a minimum tip for each comment.
This channel requires a minimum amount f: This channel requires a minimum amount for HyperChats to be visible.
This settings is not applicable if all c: This settings is not applicable if all comments require a tip.

We apologize for this inconvenience, but: We apologize for this inconvenience, but have added this additional step to prevent abuse. Users on VPN or shared connections will continue to see this message and are not eligible for Rewards.

On Firefox, notifications won't function: On Firefox, notifications won't function if cookies are set to clear on browser close. Please disable or add an exception for Odysee, then refresh.

For streaming from your mobile device, w: For streaming from your mobile device, we recommend PRISM Live Studio from the app store.
Scheduled livestreams will appear at the: Scheduled livestreams will appear at the top of your channel page and for your followers. Regular livestreams will only appear once you are actually live.
Confirmation process takes a few minutes: Confirmation process takes a few minutes, but then you can go live anytime. The stream is not shown anywhere until you are broadcasting.
Your scheduled streams will appear on yo: Your scheduled streams will appear on your channel page and for your followers. Chat will not be active until 5 minutes before the start time.
You will not see scheduled livestreams b: You will not see scheduled livestreams by people you follow on the home or following page.
Scheduled streams hidden, you can re-ena: Scheduled streams hidden, you can re-enable them in settings.
